cause.description:
Where: Oklahoma, USA When: TBA
Please download Registration sheet:
http://raceseries.runnersworld.com/raceevent/downloadParticipantsFile.html
Volunteers needed:
I need at least ten volunteers to help out with the race.
at least one person to register runners and assign numbers 3 timers 1 to hand out water. 1 to call out times at the two mile mark 1 to call out finish time for each runner 1 to record finish time on a piece of paper 1 to record finish time on runners bib tag 1 to tear tags off of numbers and recording time
Registration is $20.00
First 50 entries will get a free T-shirt!
1. Benefit Tiny Stars
cause.name: 5K Walk/Run for Tiny Stars
